summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4028 for the improvement of 1st Avenue Northeast, form East 42nd Street to East 45th Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 48742, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
